name: Space Hawk - Save the galaxy from destruction
name_original: Space Hawk - Save the galaxy from destruction
description:
ATTENTION: The app can only be played in combination with Ravensburger’s "SPACE HAWK Starter Set". The app works with the following devices: iPod touch 5th generation (with rear-side camera), iPhone 4S and newer devices.

SPACE HAWK – Save the galaxy from destruction!

Play in a new dimension!
Bring your SPACE HAWK spaceship to life with your iPhone or iPod touch!

The SPACE HAWK is the most advanced spaceship in the STAR PATROL fleet. With it's flight, action and hover modes, SPACE HAWK can handle any dangerous situation and any mission. As the captain of the SPACE HAWK, you use the app to control the spaceship with your actual movements and turn your entire surroundings into an fascinating galaxy. Experience exciting adventures on faraway planets and face the dark dangers at the edge of the universe.

With the SPACE HAWK Starter Set, the fascinating space saga with Captain T. Jenner and his crew is ready to launch. Shortly after the SPACE HAWK’s first test flight, the POLARIS sector is attacked by dangerous space monsters and an unknown danger threatens the entire galaxy as the planet ATLANTICA is suddenly torn apart. The Space Hawk receives emergency signals from everywhere in the region: space monsters are attacking settlements and asteroids are hurtling through space towards planets. The Space Hawk crew needs you to help them on their mission to save the planets!

Defeat space monsters, discover new planets, gain additional abilities and turn the SPACE HAWK into the best spaceship in the STAR PATROL fleet.

SPACE HAWK – YOUR MISSION STARTS HERE!
